events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's concern regarding returning the product and receiving money back has been classified under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to refund specialist agent Sarah J. who will handle the return process.

Thank you for the details. You can send the product back within 14 days for a full refund. I will email you a prepaid return label shortly.
